Class PublisherController

java.lang.Object
com.library.library_management.controllers.admin.PublisherController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/publishers") public class PublisherController extends Object
Controller class for managing publishers in the library management system.

The PublisherController facilitates the management of CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for publishers. It interacts with the PublisherDAO to perform database operations and communicates with view templates to display data in the admin interface.

Marked with the Controller annotation, this class is part of the Spring MVC framework and processes HTTP requests under the base path /publishers.

  • Constructor Details

    • PublisherController

      public PublisherController(PublisherDAO publisherDAO)
      Creates an instance of PublisherController with the specified PublisherDAO.

  • Method Details

    • showPublishers

      @GetMapping public String showPublishers(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the list of publishers.

      Fetches all publishers from the database using PublisherDAO.getAll(), and adds the list to the Model. The returned view template renders the publisher list in the administrative interface.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template that displays the list of publishers

    • deletePublisher

      @PostMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deletePublisher(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to delete a publisher by its ID.

      Deletes the publisher identified by the given id using PublisherDAO.delete(int). After successful deletion, redirects to the /publishers endpoint to display the updated list of publishers.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the publisher to be deleted
      Returns:
      a redirect to the publisher list view

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the form for updating publisher details.

      Fetches the publisher identified by the given id using PublisherDAO.getById(int), and adds it to the Model. The returned view template renders a form for updating the publisher's details.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the publisher to update
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for updating a publisher

    • updatePublisher

      @PostMapping("/update") public String updatePublisher(@ModelAttribute Publisher publisher)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to update a publisher's details.

      Updates the specified Publisher entity in the database using PublisherDAO.update(Publisher). After the update, redirects to the /publishers endpoint to display the updated list of publishers.

      Parameters:
      publisher - the updated Publisher entity to save
      Returns:
      a redirect to the publisher list view

    • showAddForm

      @GetMapping("/add") public String showAddForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the form for adding a new publisher.

      Initializes a new Publisher object and adds it to the Model, allowing the form to be rendered for creating a new publisher.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for adding a new publisher

    • addPublisher

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addPublisher(@ModelAttribute Publisher publisher)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to add a new publisher.

      Inserts the specified Publisher entity into the database using PublisherDAO.insert(Publisher). After the addition, redirects to the /publishers endpoint to display the updated list of publishers.

      Parameters:
      publisher - the Publisher entity to add
      Returns:
      a redirect to the publisher list view
